column4: When I start ubuntu I have a Icon hda1 (for windows partition) on my working area. So, how do I rename it?
: Format that drive for Linux and get rid of Windows? :)
Seriously though, check your fstab file.
Although  I use windows, I have gimp, open office (instead of msword), gaim and frostwire there. So, my windows is half open source :-)
